title: Research Topic: Institutional Resistance Within Government Agencies
summary: Based on the research priority 'Institutional Resistance Within Government Agencies', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Track instances of government employees and agencies resisting authoritarian directives, including whistleblowing, policy resistance, and bureaucratic slowdowns.... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
